name: Spacewaves
description:
Spacewaves is an asteroids-style game inspired by Walkman controls - for the 2020.2 Brackeys Game Jam.

Pesky sound waves want to ruin your '80s retro synthwave vibes! Blast them before they ruin the music to score points. 

Pick up power-ups along the way to help out:

  • ⏺ Free points (didn't finish)
  • ⏪ Rewind and regain lost health
  • ⏩ Speed things up (+ invulnerability)
  • ⏸ Freeze!

Didn't make it? Use your points to upgrade and improve your high score!

____________________________________________________________________

Keyboard Controls:

  • Turn and Boost: WASD/Arrow Keys
  • Fire: Enter/Space/Mouse Click
  • (Dev) Spawn Powerups/Enemies: K/L. Left this in because why not.

Gamepad:

  • Turn and Boost: Left Stick/D-Pad
  • Fire: A/B

____________________________________________________________________

Thanks for playing our first game!
